hew.definition: chop or cut with an axe
hew.sentence: they will hew the timber in the forest

shear.definition: cut off (something such as hair, wool, or grass), with scissors
shear.sentence: the spines were sheared off of the cactus

shelter.definition: a place giving temporary protection from bad weather or danger
shelter.sentence: we must find shelter to be safe from the storm

vessel.sentence: his vessel will carry us across the sea

water.definition: a colorless, transparent liquid that forms the seas
water.sentence: the bucket of water put out the fire
